document_data.name: ''Axe of Sharpness''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''axe of sharpness''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[battleaxe]] that could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: A blow from an ''axe of sharpness'' always drew more blood than a blow from a regular axe. In addition, the wielder could sometime pull off a maneuver to sweep cleanly into an enemy, wounding them massively and leaving them struggling to defend themselves from subsequent attacks.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Tommus Tallstep]], a [[halfling]] [[fighter]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
